All the possible states a job can be in

    </th>

    <tr><td><p><strong><code>ACCEPTED</code></strong></p><p>The job was accepted by the agent, and now it's waiting to start running</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong><code>ASSIGNED</code></strong></p><p>The job has been assigned to an agent, and it's waiting for it to
